name: JumpyFox
description:
Jumpy Fox is a simple one-button game in which you have to navigate our beloved fox past the obstacles.

You do this by tapping the screen repeatedly. Each time you touch the screen, the fox jumps. Don't make it jump too high or it will die. This means you have to tap at the right moments to make the fox go as far as you can!

Get the Fire Flower and Jumpy Fox will become Fire Fox and will throw Fire Balls!

Jumpy Fox supports high resolution for an optimal gaming experience on both phones and tablets.

Become a fan of Jumpy Fox and access to Beta versions here:

https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101596465934431179274
